sentences.english: The reactions of the amygdala are so quick that they are for all intents automatic.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁核的反應是如此之快以至於它們幾乎是無意識的。

sentences.english: They decided to try simultaneously activating DLSC while inhibiting the amygdala.
sentences.chinese: 他們決定嘗試在激活DLSC的同時抑制杏仁核。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the correlation between Fully-kindled Insular and Amygdaloid Model of Epilepsy in seizure of Rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討島葉與杏仁核在癲癇發作中的相互關係。

sentences.english: There was a correlation between the up expression of GAD65 in the amygdala and elevated blood glucose levels.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁核GAD65的表達升高與血糖升高存在相關性。

sentences.english: VNS can also inhibit the discharge of amygdala nucleus significantly.
sentences.chinese: VNS尤其對杏仁核放電有明顯的抑制作用。

sentences.english: It keeps the amygdala in check… usually.
sentences.chinese: 通常它能使杏仁核受到抑制。

sentences.english: The effect of antiepilepsirine, a derivative of piperine, on the rat amygdala kindled seizures was studied.
sentences.chinese: 用大鼠杏仁核點燃模型研究了抗癇靈的抗癲癇作用。

sentences.english: The tumor is located in the right amygdala, with irregular activity seen in the surrounding right temporal lobe.
sentences.chinese: 腫瘤位於右側杏仁核，在右顳葉周圍不規則運動。
